hadiths.text: It was narrated that Rifa'ah bin 'Arabah A-Juhani said:"The swearing of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) when he took an oath and I bear witness before Allah was: 'By the One in Whose Hand is my soul

chapter.ara-name: باب يَمِينِ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ الَّتِي كَانَ يَحْلِفُ بِهَا
chapter.eng-name: The swearing of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) by which he would take an oath
